name: Complex Hallucination
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Intrigue © 2016, Paizo Inc.
text: This spell functions as audiovisual hallucination, except that the phantasm you create can also include olfactory, tactile, and thermal effects.
text_zh: 该法术的功能就如同视听错觉（Audiovisual Hallucination；见本书204页）一般，不过由你创造的魅影幻觉还能够包含嗅觉、触觉和温度效果。
